name: Creamed Cabbage
keywords: cabbage, garlic, heavy cream, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 pound cabbage, coarsely chopped against the grain
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a frying pan and add the cabbage and garlic. Cook, stirring, for about 10 minutes, until the cabbage has softened a bit but is still crunchy.
Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Stir in the heavy cream and cook for five minutes more. Correct seasoning and serve.
